Megatron:





"Ah, good, a logical bot." he said. He stood up. "I think it would be wise 
for a true leader to guide you and the rest of the Predacons, wouldn't it? A 
Predacon uses team work, so I want to reunite the Predacon army to it's 
greater glory. Let me guide you the rest of the way. I am a experienced bot 
with a strong heritage."
